description: Unit test code for the TextReader class, testing its basic functionality such as reading a line of text.

classes.name: TextReader
classes.description: A class that likely reads text fragments from a data element.

classes.name: DataElement
classes.description: A data structure for encapsulating data with length and content.

classes.name: TextFragment
classes.description: A class representing a fragment of text read by TextReader.

methods.name: Reset
methods.description: Resets the TextReader to its initial state.

methods.name: ReadLine
methods.description: Reads a line of text from the input.
